title: AND we are here!
description: Hey, welcome! In this level we are going to show you the mystery of the 'and' operator!
We have one available premise in this level, but hey! We need to both prove A, and prove B! How can we do this?
Our friend 'and' operator is here to help! An expression 'A ∧ B' (also known as a logical conjunction of A and B) entails both A and B.
Notice that ∧ is commutative. That is, 'A ∧ B' and 'B ∧ A' are equivalent!
